title: WA Premier pleads for federal stability
content:
Ongoing instability in Australian federal politics has been extremely damaging to the nation's reputation in the Asia Pacific region, according to West Australian Premier Colin Barnett. 

Mr Barnett congratulated Prime Minister Designate Malcolm Turnbull, who he described as a friend, and appealed for consistent leadership, following a "brutal" 24 hours in Australian politics. 

"To topple an elected and serving Prime Minister in his first year of office is not something to be proud of," Mr Barnett said on Tuesday.
